attributes.action: Implement minimal custodial sentences for child sexual offenders.
attributes.additional_details: At what point does the craving for these images become a craving for the child in the flesh then become a reality. A child who has been abused suffers mentally which leads to suicide and mental health issues.I propose the goverment of Great Britain Implement a bill for a mandatory custodial sentence of a minimum of 5 years for any barbarian in possession of child images and a minimum of 10 years for any person regardless of age who interferes with a child indiscriminately of the "severity" .
attributes.background: Our children need and deserve protection from these miscreants. they are sharing content of them via social networking sites, printing them in person, mobile messaging groups discussing them in a sexual nature with other disgusting abusers and as disturbing as it is they are MASTERBATING over them.
